pageTitle: CLIPPERS SET 2012 NBA SUMMER LEAGUE ROSTER - JULY 11, 2012 | THE OFFICIAL SITE OF THE LOS ANGELES CLIPPERS
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {34179=The Clippers' roster, summer league coaching staff and schedule for the 2012 NBA Summer League are listed below:, 44932=2012 LOS ANGELES CLIPPERS NBA SUMMER LEAGUE SCHEDULE, 33588=Los Angeles Clippers' third-year point guard Eric Bledsoe and second year players Trey Thompkins and Travis Leslie will form the nucleus of the Los Angeles Clippers' entry in the 2012 NBA Summer League, which will open summer league play against the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 16th in Las Vegas., 33924=The 2012 NBA Summer League in Las Vegas will feature a record 24 teams competing in a 60-game schedule July 13-22 at the Thomas & Mack Center and the COX Pavilion on the campus of the University of Nevada Las Vegas.}
textBeforeTable: The Clippers' roster, summer league coaching staff and schedule for the 2012 NBA Summer League are listed below: The 2012 NBA Summer League in Las Vegas will feature a record 24 teams competing in a 60-game schedule July 13-22 at the Thomas & Mack Center and the COX Pavilion on the campus of the University of Nevada Las Vegas. Los Angeles Clippers' third-year point guard Eric Bledsoe and second year players Trey Thompkins and Travis Leslie will form the nucleus of the Los Angeles Clippers' entry in the 2012 NBA Summer League, which will open summer league play against the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 16th in Las Vegas. Watch games online with Summer League Broadband 7/11/12 CLIPPERS SET 2012 NBA SUMMER LEAGUE ROSTER For Immediate Release #article-body .sub-text a {color:#ed174c; font-weight:bold;} #article-body .sub-text a:hover {color:#ffffff; background-color:#ed174c; font-weight:bold;} #article-body .sub1-text {color:#000000; background-color:#ffffff; font-face:Arial; font-size:15px; text-decoration:none; } #article-body .price-text {color:#ffffff; background-color:#003781; font-face:Arial; font-size:17px; text-decoration:none; } #article-body .title-text {color:#ed174c; background-color:#efefef; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 20px; text-decoration:none; font-weight:bold;} #article-body .sub-text {color:#000000; background-color:#; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 13px; text-decoration:none; } #article-body .sub-main-text {color:#000000; background-color:#; font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-decoration:none; font-weight:bold; } #article-body .sub-header-text {color:#393939; background-color:#;
textAfterTable: Head Coach: Robert Pack USC Assistant Coach: Dave Severns Cal State - Chico Assistant Coach: Howard Eisley Boston College Assistant Coach: Raman Sposato Oregon Head Athletic Trainer: Jasen Powell Cal Poly Pomona Strength & Conditioning Coach: Richard Williams Tabor College Assistant Athletic Trainer/Assistant Strength & Conditioning Coach: Joe Resendez Louisiana Tech Roster is subject to change. 2012 LOS ANGELES CLIPPERS NBA SUMMER LEAGUE SCHEDULE July 16: vs. Minnesota 7:00 PM COX Pavilion July 18: vs. San Antonio 7:00 PM COX Pavilion July 19: vs. Lakers 5:30 PM Thomas & Mack Center July 21: vs. Chicago 5:30 PM Thomas & Mack Center July 22: vs. Boston 3:00 PM COX Pavilion Watch games online with Summer League Broadband
